continuum_deployer.utils.exceptions module¶

exception continuum_deployer.utils.exceptions.FileTypeNotSupported(message='')¶

Bases: Exception

The filetype of the given file is not supported by the application module that tries to work with it.

exception continuum_deployer.utils.exceptions.ImporterError(message='')¶

Bases: Exception

ImporterError is trough on a group of errors that can occur during the Importers import process.

exception continuum_deployer.utils.exceptions.RequirementsError(message='')¶

Bases: Exception

An external requirement of a certain application component is not satisfied.

exception continuum_deployer.utils.exceptions.SolverError(message='')¶

Bases: Exception

SolverError is trough on a group of errors that can occur during the solvers matchmaking process.

continuum_deployer.utils.plugin_loader module¶

class continuum_deployer.utils.plugin_loader.PluginLoader(add_default_path=True)¶

Bases: object

add_plugins_path(path)¶

Adds an additional path to the loader where plugins might be placed. A reload is not done automatically.

Parameters

path (str) – filesystem path where the loader should search for plugins

get_plugin_manager()¶

Getter for the plugin manager

the current instance of the plugin manager

Bases: yapsy.PluginManager.PluginManager

instanciateElement(element)¶

DEPRECATED(>1.11): reimplement instead instanciateElementWithImportInfo !

Override this method to customize how plugins are instanciated.

Warning

This method is called only if

instanciateElementWithImportInfo has not been reimplemented !
